title: sync client v 1.1.1 crashes after 3-10 mins
body:
the sync client crashes after 3-5 min.
i can reproduce the error on different machines.
it's the first sync from client to cloud.

tried to sync with ssl and without -> same error
tried to sync from desktop and from c:\myfolder -> same error

restarting the client and starting the sync again produces conflict data. 

here are the infos i got.

owncloud version 4.5 
client version 1.1.1
os: win 7 pro

windows error:
name der fehlerhaften anwendung: owncloud.exe, version: 0.0.0.0, zeitstempel: 0x508023eb
name des fehlerhaften moduls: msvcrt.dll, version: 7.0.7601.17744, zeitstempel: 0x4eeaf722
ausnahmecode: 0xc0000005
fehleroffset: 0x000143df
id des fehlerhaften prozesses: 0x1fd0
startzeit der fehlerhaften anwendung: 0x01cdb372f286a224
pfad der fehlerhaften anwendung: c:\program files\owncloud\owncloud.exe
pfad des fehlerhaften moduls: c:\windows\system32\msvcrt.dll
berichtskennung: caf5b832-1f67-11e2-93d7-bee2d44c3c1a

end of client logfile:
10-26 15:17:51:886 csync.owncloud - stat results fetched.
10-26 15:17:52:094 csync.owncloud - simple propfind ok.
10-26 15:17:52:094 csync.owncloud - server date from http header value: fri, 26 oct 2012 13:17:40 gmt
10-26 15:17:52:094 csync.owncloud - ok: time delta remained (almost) the same: -12.
10-26 15:17:52:094 csync.owncloud - error: result struct not valid!
